thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic stay
thread.title_full: Fantastic stay - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kim E
title: Fantastic stay
text: This hotel was quite a find. Centrally located, so that explorations uptown and SoHo/NoLita were equally possible. The room was spacious and quiet. The bed was very comfortable. Staff were extraordinarily helpful. Free drink at Happy Hour was a nice touch. Fantastic value and perfect stay for our weekend - would stay here again in a heartbeat!
